pullRequest.title: Check entries value in partition load query to disallow negative values (#1351)

commit.message: Check entries value in partition load query to disallow negative values (#1351)

nodes.bodyText: Looks like ParameterUtils #entries(HttpServletRequest) is used by other callers. Would it ever be acceptable to get a negative value for entries? If not, should we move the sanity check to ParameterUtils #entries(HttpServletRequest)?

commit.message: Move the positive check to the util class and make its error message more concise
Move entries check back to its original line
